WorkItem.Description:
Shadow Infusion and Dark Transformation isn't being properly modelled yet, it affects a number of things:
-Runic Power is under valued (Butchery talent is valued negatively)
-T12 2 piece bonus (Elementium Deathplate) is valued negatively
-It seems to affect the value of mastery at some points although I don't understand how.
 
I tried adding a hacked dps of 1/3*ghoul dps as a value for Dark Transformation. 
 
From worldoflogs, it seems 50-60% uptime can be achieved. Sweeping claw on a single target seems to do about double damage from normal claw. Is this then 2x ghoul damage with 50% uptime, so about same as normal ghoul dps?
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Unholy: Shadow Infusion and Dark Transformation modelling missing
